# windowState(for:)

**Instance Method**

Called when the state of the window is needed.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor optional func windowState(for context: WKWebExtensionContext) -> WKWebExtension.WindowState
```

## Parameters

- **context**: The context in which the web extension is running.

## Discussion

Defaults to[doc://com.apple.webkit/documentation/WebKit/WKWebExtension/WindowState/normal] if not implemented.
